author: hudsonjameson
content: Ropsten blocks keep getting reorged and is making it not very usable. Anything anyone can do? Additionally, does this indicate someone testing out attacks (maybe not our chain, but a chain with less hashpower like ETC)?

author: timbeiko
content: On the 1559 call, we discussed how to potentially fund client work for this. I want to set up a call sometime next week with the various teams to see what would be a reasonable way to get it done.
